code: import{createStore,compose,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import rootReducer from'../reducers/rootReducer';import createSocketMiddleware from'./socketMiddleware';var composeEnhancer=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var socketMiddleware=createSocketMiddleware("http://127.0.0.1:6969");export default function configureStore(){return createStore(rootReducer,composeEnhancer(applyMiddleware(socketMiddleware)));}
